scripts.generate:certs: shx mkdir -p ./certs/https && cross-env-shell "dotnet dev-certs https --clean && dotnet dev-certs https -ep ./certs/https/development.pfx -p 1111 && dotnet dev-certs https --trust"
scripts.docker:tools: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.debug.yml --profile tools up
scripts.docker:backend:tools: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.debug.yml --profile backend --profile tools up
scripts.docker:identity:tools: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.debug.yml --profile identity --profile tools up
scripts.docker:fullstack: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile frontend --profile backend up
scripts.docker:fullstack:tools: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile frontend --profile backend --profile tools up
scripts.docker:fullstack:detach: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile frontend --profile backend up -d
